content: measures 32 inches 81 cm or to desired length bind off all stitches break yarn finishing weave in ends thread drawstring through eyelet row of top variations to work bag in one color use 160 grams of washable worsted weight yarn and work all instructions in color a for a scrappy bag use 160 grams of washable worsted weight yarn in any number of colors designate one yarn as color a and another as color b as your scraps run out for either color join in a new yarn which will adopt the color a/b assignment from the previous yarn © 2025 shelby dyas all rights reserved mantra mat bag page 3 of 3 shelby knits
